buttons.start: Tús a Chur le Comhrá Nua

basic.text_02: In this chat we will use {{verb}}, {{tense}}, and {{form}}

basic.text_01: 10 questions in total, with 10 points for each
Ok, here comes your first question
basic.text_02: get ready for your first question

basic.text_01: Well done, that's the last question {{name}}!
I look forward to seeing you again soon

omitted.text_01: GA - hey, you left out a fada
omitted.text_03: GA - add in a fada somewhere

extra.text_01: GA - wow, no need for that fada
extra.text_02: GA - you don't always need a fada

form.text_01: GA - tense is right, but check the form again

verb.text_01: GA - make sure to use the correct verb

tense.text_01: GA - remember to use the right tense

person.text_01: GA - check who is doing the action

one.text_01: GA - watch out for any minor typos!
one.text_03: GA - don't add in any extra letters

againstRule.text_01: GA - remember the caol le caol, leathan le leathan rule
againstRule.text_02: GA - watch out for the broad/slender vowels

error.text_01: GA - you might want to rethink that one

crash.title: Hmmmmm… chlis ar an gcóras. Is féidir leat:

options.email: Dul i dteagmháil le foireann ABAIR ag an seoladh - sloanjs@tcd.ie
options.reset: Brúigh anseo chun an feidhmchlár a athshocrú
